rules_text:
Trample
Suspend 2–{1}{G}{G} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{G}{G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
Nascent Sapling enters with two +1/+1 counters on it if it was cast from exile.
